About us

Knockout Boxing is more than just a gym. We're a family. Our passion for boxing and fitness drives us to provide an exceptional training environment where athletes of all levels can thrive. With years of experience in the boxing industry, our coaches are dedicated to helping you unleash your full potential. Join us, step into the ring, and transform yourself into a formidable force. Together, we'll create the champion within you.

FAQ's

Do I need boxing experience to join?

No experience needed! Our gym caters to beginners and advanced members alike.

What should I bring to my first class?

Wear comfy workout clothes and trainers, bring water, gloves and wraps are available or for purchase.

What level of fitness should I be at before joining?

You don't need to be at any level of fitness, our coaches can train you regardless of your fitness level. It's our job to get you fit.

Is there an age limit?

All ages are welcome. We have programmes for kids, teens, and adults.

Can I try a class before becoming a member?

Yes, we offer trial classes for a small fee.

How do I sign up?

Contact us to book a visit or call us to find out where you can join the gym.
